addHUDs

protected static void addHUDs(HUDManager manager)
In this example program, simply adds some hard-coded HUDs; a typical editor would load classes from some form of config file or etc to dynamically include additional features.

Parameters:
manager - Model (in MVC terminology) that holds info on the HUDs
